description: This Dart file defines a function to build a list of top-level providers for dependency injection in a Flutter application, primarily involving the AuthState provider.

methods.name: buildAppProviders
methods.description: Creates and returns a list of provider widgets for dependency injection, allowing optional injection of an existing AuthState or a default one.

parameters.name: authState
parameters.description: An optional AuthState instance to inject; if null, a new instance is created.
